title: Pool Party
description: Robert throws a party for the Dunder Mifflin staff at his house before he sells it because of his divorce. At the party, Erin and Dwight agree to flirt with each other to make Andy jealous, and Jim tries in vain to duck out early.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Oh, ugh. [stands and looks at meatball in chair] What is this, a meatball? Really? [Stanley laughs]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: It's always more fun to mess with Dwight with an audience. That was usually Pam so now that she's out I had to find someone else. Turns out that Stanley is quite the comedy fan. But not everything makes him laugh. He has very specific tastes. Through a painstaking process of trial and error, I've found out what he likes. And it's really weird.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Jim, come on! That's so juvenile! What the- [opens drawer full of meatballs]

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.text: You've been meatballed! [laughs]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Ugh.

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.text: Are you ready for some meatball?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Aw, man. [Stanley laughs] This is not very clever, Jim.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: I know.

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.text: Look for your stapler!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [Dwight finds stapler in giant meatball] Really Jim? Really? Very funny.

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.text: [to Phyllis] Oh okay. Good night. [climbs in to Dwight's car] What's the haul?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Thirty-two meatballs.

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.text: Good day.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: That idiot's been feeding us for a week.

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.text: We'll never have to buy meatballs again.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: [phone rings] Dunder Mifflin. Jessica, hi! How are you? Oh yay, that's so great to hear.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: I'm not going to be one of those exes who can't move on. They have their life and I have mine. I'm taking an Italian class. So far I've learned tortellini, spagettini, linguini... Well it's not so much a class as a restaurant, but I do Monday, Wednesday, Friday from seven to nine.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: I will patch you through right now. You sound really pretty today. Okay.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Jessica! I love you! That's a message from my mom.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: My parents met Jessica and they completely flipped for her so they gave me this old family ring to use on her. I know, whoa! Pump the breaks, Bernard, too early! I get it. I just, you know, I'm just carrying it around, seeing how it feels. I haven't proposed to anyone in years... Mom took the main diamond out, she thought that had more of a my little brother kind of vibe to it, but...

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: [Robert is looking at pictures of a house online] Whoa, looks pretty nice. Got a little bit of a Shining vibe, though.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: Oh, who needs a house that size?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Big. Stupid. Pure chump bait.

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: I'm selling the house, actually.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: You know, there's a glare from over here... oh wow, that's magnificent.

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: It's mid-recession in a depressed area of a faltering state and I've got the most expensive house on the market. The one percent are suffering too, people. I wanted it to be my Playboy mansion. A temple to wine, revelry, sex, intrigue... this was hot on the heels of Eyes Wide Shut, mind you. Then I met my wife, she moved in, made it her own. Now she's left me and forced me to sell the place. The ultimate insult? They're calling my speakeasy lounge a rumpus room. [Jim laughs] Does my turmoil amuse you, Jim?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: I'm sorry, I thought you were making a joke.

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: What could you possibly have found funny in what I said? What was the joke you thought you heard?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: I guess I thought you were approaching it with more of a sarcasm than misery. Kind of laughing at your own pain, sad clown thing.

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: Oh yes. How hilarious it is to laugh at clowns, the painted jesters of the dying circus industry. Very funny, Jim. I get it.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Um, I'm getting reports of a serious outbreak of the grumpies in here.

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: A beautiful monster cost me my forties and my dream home. I think I'm entitled to the occasional bad day.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Well, please tell Susan we all say hi.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Dude, what if, since you're feeling grumpy, we all swing by tonight and check out your indoor pool? [Robert laughs]

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: Kevin, no.

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: What, as some sort of last hoorah?

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Yeah. All of us in the pool, saying hoorah. Maybe the last one that says hoorah is it.

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: You know I suppose someone should enjoy the place before I hand it over to the staging experts at Remax tomorrow.  Let's try this: everyone, tonight, my house, wear a swimsuit. Let's just call it a get-together. And let's say no food.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Hey Oscar, was that you who just created a party out of thin air or was it me?

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: That was you, Kevin.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: It was me.

quotes.speaker: Meredith
quotes.text: You going tonight, kiddo? Cause I can give you a lift.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Oh, I don't know, Meredith. It seems like you shouldn't drive maybe ever.

quotes.speaker: Meredith
quotes.text: It's no problem. You live right near me.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: How do you know where I live?

quotes.speaker: Meredith
quotes.text: Andy followed you home after the Christmas party.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Why?

quotes.speaker: Meredith
quotes.text: He wanted to make sure California didn't put it in you.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Oh. Come on.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Wow. Andy's such a weird stalker. Following me home like that when he has a girlfriend? I should get a restraining order. [squeaks]

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: [sticks a hand in the pool] Oh, it is warm.

quotes.speaker: Cathy
quotes.text: It's almost too warm.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: I'm feeling eighty-two, eighty-two and a half.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: Oh, so close. Eighty-one.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: [to Cathy] Well, we'll say its eight-two and it'll be our secret.

quotes.speaker: Cathy
quotes.text: [to Jim] Hey, late guy.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Hey. Wow. Just stopping by. Got another party to go to. A wife and two kids at home party.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Oh.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: DJ Pam Halpert is spinning some serious Radio Disney tonight.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: You're looking at the master of leaving parties early. They key is, you have to make a strong impression, so you want to have a picture taken, you want to say some peculiar non sequitur that people remember, you want to note something unique, a talking point, for later. I don't mean to brag, but New Year's Eve, I was home by nine.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Robert, just wanted to grab you one second. This place is amazing, by the way.

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: You should see the whole thing.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: I bet I should. [takes cell phone photo] That's beautiful, I'm going to email that to you.

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: I'm just about to give the tour.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: All right-

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: Join us. You must see what you were laughing about.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: I must...

quotes.speaker: Jessica
quotes.text: [looks at pool] Wow.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: [hides ring] Yeah, it's pretty serious poolage.

quotes.speaker: Jessica
quotes.text: [sees Andy's hand in his pocket] What are you doing?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Hmm? Flicking a bug off my wiener. [they both laugh]

quotes.speaker: Jessica
quotes.text: Gross. I'm getting a drink. Do you want anything?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: No, I'm good.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: [runs to Andy] Funny how we can be surrounded by people and still feel so lonely. Hi.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Hi.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: How is everything? How's your car?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: It's great. You know. Reliable. Great mileage.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Is that so? How about this weekend we take that sucker to a duck pond or something? Maybe get caught in the rain?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Well, I can't. I'm going skiing with Jessica. you know, a couple of dopes on the slopes.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Oh, like a goodbye trip.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: No. What?

quotes.speaker: Jessica
quotes.text: Hey.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Hi.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: I guess Andy isn't totally over his current girlfriend. But, if he was jealous once before then maybe I can make him jealous again. Just not with Robert. He told me he was a ride I wouldn't survive, and I believe him.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: Val. You made it.

quotes.speaker: Val
quotes.text: Yup, yup.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: Uh oh, look at this. Red plastic cup, red plastic cup. How about that?

quotes.speaker: Val
quotes.text: You know, you are just as dumb at night.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: Mmm. [they clink cups]

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: All right, theres- this would be no problem. I could swim under, one breath.

quotes.speaker: Jessica
quotes.text: No, show me.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Okay.

quotes.speaker: Jessica
quotes.text: Dive in right here.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: In a minute. In a minute.

quotes.speaker: Jessica
quotes.text: Okay. You don't know what you're doing.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: A minute would be cool.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Hey, Dwight Snoot.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: What-

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: What you doing?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: I'm relaxing. Scram. [pushes her]

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Ow.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Hey, Stanley. Um, what happened to my pants?

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.text: I moved them. Pants only need a chair if there's a person in them.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Where... [finds pants, looks for ring]

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Come on, don't you want to play?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Oh really?

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Yeah.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Yeah, you want to play you little hick? [kicks her in to the pool, Erin screams]

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Whoa.

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: Dwight! Oh my gosh! Dwight!

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: Here we have the parlor. I imagined people would set down their coats and symbolically their inhibitions. This was the gateway. You enter this room a lawyer, a doctor, a teacher, a judge, but beyond it you're simply a penis, a vagina, hunger, ache. Susan used it as a Pilates studio.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: [sees wine collection] Holy cow!

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: Wine collection.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: How many bottles? Three hundred?

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: [laughs] About twelve hundred. What the hell, grab a bottle. Less inventory for the lawyers.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: Toby! Chateau Margaux ninety-five. You know your wine.

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: Well, and you have a... yes, a- d- another chateau.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: Robert, you are too kind.

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: Oh.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: Too kind doesn't begin to cover it.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: With ammunition like this we are in for quite a night, you and me.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: And Gabe-y makes three.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Robert, thank you. Thank you for this. Thank you for all this. This night's been magical.

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: Jim, come see this next room. I think you especially would like it.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Really? Why?

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: I don't know. Maybe not. Just come.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: [Dwight dunks her] Oh!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [laughs] You regret attacking me now, hick? Huh?

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Stop it. Dwight, I was flirting with you. I was trying to use you to make Andy jealous.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: I'm not going to help you. Why would you choose me? Because I'm mighty? Because I'm the manliest man in the office? I'll do it. [he picks her up]

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: [giggles] Oh Dwight!

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: [giggles] Stop.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: You stop.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: No, you stop.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: No, you stop.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: [to camera] Is he looking? [shakes her head] Oh. You can stop.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Okay, you can stop.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: No, no, no, he's not looking.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: No, you can stop.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: You can actually stop.

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: Whoa, you guys, I just found this insane engagement ring. Is anyone missing this?

quotes.speaker: Meredith
quotes.text: The main stone's missing.

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: I don't know. It looks pretty great to me.

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: I pictured myself here every night eating a leg of mutton, the juices dripping down my bare chest, wiping my fingers on the walls. Then I met the vegan.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Good night.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: [raises wine bottle] To the kitchen!

quotes.speaker: All
quotes.text: To the kitchen!

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: To the kitchen. Onward!

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: Toby, what's compelling about this is the note of persimmon. Right?

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: Note? It's a symphony.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: Okay, you have to join my wine-tasting club.

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: I would love that.

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: Toby, you are playing a dangerous game. Guess I'm through the gateway now, though, right?

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: [to Val] You know, I don't think I've ever been in this exact angle before. I was scared at first, but I like it.

quotes.speaker: Meredith
quotes.text: You guys got to try this pool. No top scum, no band-aids. This thing is choice.

quotes.speaker: Val
quotes.text: You in?

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: Yeah, sure, sure. I'll be right in.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: I've been working out. But, the problem is, I've been building muscle underneath. And that top layer hasn't burned off yet. Awkward stage.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [he and Erin feed each other chips] Ah, mmm. So good. Now take a chip, crush it into my face, really rub the grease around. Do it. Now rub it in. Oh, yeah, that's so good. Ah...

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Andy's not even looking. I think sexy eating is a dead end.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Damn it.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: What is the most romantic possible thing?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: We can get some chicken fights going in the pool.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Dwight, that's just- that's really perfect. Thank you.

quotes.speaker: Both
quotes.text: Yes! [they high five and jump in the pool]

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: You're in my way!

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Andy, Dwight and I challenge you and Jess to a chicken fight. Winner take all.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Chicken fight!

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: No thanks.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Dang it! What the heck already?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Hey, Cathy. Chicken fight!

quotes.speaker: Cathy
quotes.text: Okay, yeah. Who's going to be my partner? Where's Jim?

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: I'm right here! [gets in pool] Cold. Cold. Come on, Cath.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Yeah- oh!

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: [knocks Cathy off Kevin's shoulders] Yes! Woo!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Woohoo! Yes!

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Dwight, our chemistry is really clicking. We work so well together.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: I know. I could just bang you right now.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: He's not looking. [Dwight dumps her in the pool] Hey!

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: I had two bears sewn together to make this king-size. Total waste of two bears.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: To both these bears.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: To both these bears.

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: Bears.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: To both these bears.

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: When I put in the screening room, I bought three movies: Caligula, Last Tango in Paris, and Emmanuelle 2. Last two movies I actually watched in here Marley and Me and On Golden [bleep] Pond.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: I mean, it's clearly meant for watching erotic cinema.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: Yup. We could watch some right now if you want. I got a Korean film on my iPod if you want to just- if you have the cables.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Kelly, that's a crazy ring you found.

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: Yeah, thanks. I'm really glad I found it.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: I can't believe you're wearing it. Are you not superstitious at all?

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: Shh. Of course I'm superstitious. What are you talking about?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: The ring of a failed marriage might have some sinister energy, right? Am I just being silly?

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: Oh, I don't think you're being silly.

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: Oh God. [takes off ring]

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: You know what, I can just sell it and put the money in the party fund.

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: [snatches ring] Then another woman will get it. We can't allow that. We have to destroy it.

quotes.speaker: Jessica
quotes.text: [to Andy] Come on. Let's chicken fight those two.

quotes.speaker: Val
quotes.text: [comes up from under water] How was that?

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Okay. Watch my toes. [does hand stand]

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: Hey Val. Want a beer? It might taste better than that pool water you've been drinking.

quotes.speaker: Val
quotes.text: No, I'm good. Thank you.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: Cool.

quotes.speaker: Val
quotes.text: Cool. [to Kevin] Does Darryl not swim?

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: That's racist! I don't know. But I would say, by looking at him, no, Darryl does not swim.

quotes.speaker: Jessica
quotes.text: [knocks Erin off Dwight's shoulders] Yes!

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Yeah!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [to Erin] Maybe we should take a little break.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Dwight, we've got this. I promise. I will not leave your shoulders, no matter what.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Okay.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: One more?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Yeah!

quotes.speaker: Jessica
quotes.text: Yeah! Great! [others cheer and clap]

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Mush, mush, mush! Come on!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Go!

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Go! Okay. Yeah.

quotes.speaker: Jessica
quotes.text: Here we go! [knocks Erin over] Yes!

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Yay! [Erin comes back up] Whoa!

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Wow!

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: I cannot believe you're still up!

quotes.speaker: Jessica
quotes.text: I cannot believe it either.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: I've got this! [Dwight gasps] Charge! Go! Go! [Dwight sinks]

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: [muffled] Dwight are you okay? Hey, damn it-

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [coughs up water] Erin, did we win?

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Sure. Sure we did.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: You're lying. We didn't win.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Hey, hey, hey Dwight. It's okay. Just rest. Just rest.

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: You've broken up your last couple, you evil ring. Do it. [Meredith sets fire to paper ring boat]

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: We're in the pool!

quotes.speaker: Meredith
quotes.text: Shut it, Angela.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Ugh. Same old party, same old people. Am I right? Reminds me of Phyllis's birthday.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Ooh, do not remind me of Phyllis's birthday.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: I know. [laughs] But boy, that Erin. She sure is a ripe little tiger, isn't she? Rroww! And to think, I always thought of her as a second Meredith. Respectfully, I don't want us walking into a similar Angela kind of situation.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Mmm.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: So I just want to make sure that you are completely, one hundred percent done with Erin.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Last I checked, I'm with Jessica. And I like to get my monog on. It's monogamy for my hog 'n me.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Not what I asked.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: We're done. Erin and I are over.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: So then you won't mind if tonight I just go crazy on her, just go nuts, rrargh. With sex.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Have at it. Or take it slow. Whatever you guys work out.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [sighs] You're an idiot.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Kelly, that is mine! This is mine! [Val, Erin and Kevin play with pool noodles]

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Uh-uh. Uh-uh.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: No!

quotes.speaker: Val
quotes.text: Oh I've got him!

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: Cannonball! [jumps in pool] Let's do this!

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: [Erin swims up with ring] Wow.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: So I kind of stepped on this. I think it's yours.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Yeah. Oh wow. How did you know it was mine?

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: The Bernard family seal. Duh.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Duh.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Sorry if your special night was ruined.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Oh, whoa. Whoa, no, it's not a special night.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Oh, you weren't going to do that?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Honestly Erin, I don't know what I'm doing. I... I just... I don't know. Thank you.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Andy's confused. That's not what I was hoping for, but it's not so bad either. I can live with confused. I get confused. I totally get confused.

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: And of course, the pool. The ultimate lubricant for any wild evening. It was here that my parties would have crescendoed into true madness.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: To madness.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: To madness.

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: To madness. [Robert laughs]

quotes.speaker: Meredith
quotes.text: To madness.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Hey, um, I think you parked my car in. Is there any way you can move your van?

quotes.speaker: Meredith
quotes.text: Oh, I'm sorry. When I got here, I put my keys in a bowl.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Are you serious?

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: Robert, I want you to know, I'm here to rock with you as late as you want, man.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: And that goes double for me. I'll stay even later than you'd like.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: [Toby pours wine into Oscar's mouth] Toby! I am Bacchus, god of wine!

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: And I am Bacchus's friend!

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: Gentlemen, bear witness. While I've been mourning the nights that never were, one of them has been unfolding here before me. This is no get-together. This is a party. [Robert strips, jumps in pool, Gabe and Ryan join him]

quotes.speaker: All
quotes.text: Yes! Woohoo! Bravo!

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: And there's my talking point.

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: Yes, that's it. Push yourselves, boys. It's not a party if you don't do something that scares you. I need a breather. Oh. Oh. You two keep going.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: Hey, he's asleep. We can just leave.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: So leave.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: Two pools. A divider. A bridge. Good choice. It says everything about everything, right Robert?

quotes.speaker: Kathy
quotes.text: What's the water like?

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: Nice.

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: Oh, it is warm.

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: Robert's house is, well....I don't mean to sound offensive, but it's like where a basketball player would live.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Oh, Dwight.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Uh huh.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: That feels so good!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Yeah....baby.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: [grunting] Hey, Andy.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Hey.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Dwight gives the best back massages.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Yeah, it sounds like it.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Hey, have you ever been checked for scoliosis?

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: I don't know, why don't you check me Dr. Shrute. [laughing]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: No, seriously. Your spine is jacked. It's like the devil's cursive.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: You mean more like dangerous curves...

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: You'd be like 8 feet tall if this thing was straightened out...[pushes Erin back to floor]

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Ow!

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: You date a guy, you find out he was engaged to your coworker so you throw cake at him. It's over. You start liking him again so you ask him out with a puppet show. He says no. Then he follows you home to make sure that you don't kiss somebody. Then he ignores you at a pool party? Am I right ladies?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [Erin helps Dwight stretch his inner thighs] Yeah. Oh, yeah. Oooooh, yeah.

quotes.speaker: Jessica
quotes.text: You guys ready?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Bring it on guys.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Yeah...

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Let's go before I vomit. [Erin and Dwight enter pool]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Ready?

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: I'm ready.

quotes.speaker: Jessica
quotes.text: Whoo!

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Alright! Here we go.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Ok.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: RAHHH!!!!!!!

quotes.speaker: Jessica
quotes.text: Yeah, come on!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Get her! Ruin her! [Andy and Jessica beat Dwight and Erin]

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Hey! High-five!

quotes.speaker: Jessica
quotes.text: Yeah!

quotes.speaker: Jessica
quotes.text: My brother and I were the chicken fight champions of our swim club growing up. I mean, we beat the Strauss twins. Ok, I guess somebody didn't grow up in west Hartford, Connecticut.

quotes.speaker: Robert
quotes.text: This room I liked for the view. I dreamed that I would watch my guests walk to their cars at dawn, their faces flushed with the shame and regret for the choices they made the night before. [laughs]

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: I get that.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: Beautiful sentiment.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: To the shame room! [raises bottle]

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: [Robert laughs] I live in this room.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: [Toby and Oscar swig from wine bottles] Oh, Mineral-ey.

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: Mineral-ey.
